content: After the nightmares, weak is our mind. It could be the devil hiding inside everyone. Throughout these visions, it's reality, but now it makes me wonder should I carry on my way. So close to the edge, black is the night. From here to madness there's only a short step to die. Lost in the trouble, eternally I am crawling in the fire and reaching eternity. Far away beyond the sky. I come alive again screaming in the wild, resound everywhere.
author: Heavenly
